targets.query: SELECT  count(size) AS "Number of Packet", last("size") AS "Packet Size" FROM "flow_latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_label"::tag, "dst_ip"::tag, "src_ip"::tag

panels.title: Packet Size ( by src_ip, dst_ip and flow_label )

panels.description: (Default last 10 minutes, depends on the set time range from the dashboard itself)
panels.title: Number of packets per switch

targets.query: SELECT sum("size") AS "Packet Size" FROM "switch_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "flow_label", "dst_ip", "src_ip", "switch_id"
SELECT sum("size") AS "Total Packet Size" FROM "switch_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "switch_id"

SELECT moving_average(mean("latency"), 10)
FROM "switch_stats"
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY time(1s), "dst_ip", "src_ip", "flow_label"
SELECT * FROM "link_latency" WHERE $timeFilter  ORDER BY time DESC

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM flow_latency WITH KEY = src_ip
list.label: Src ip
list.name: src
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM flow_latency WITH KEY = src_ip
